column5: What's the going rate for live bait in Ontario? crawlers? leeches? minnows?Thanks!
"Larry's Bait Shop" in Kakabeka Falls were $42 a pound for leeches when I ordered them a month ago.Pooch
Minnows were $6 a dozen at camp, but we bring our own bait buckets and buy in quantity at the bait dealer south of Sioux Lookout on our ride in.
